articles.title: Only All Creatures could make a man talking to a horse so unbearably moving - The Telegraph
articles.description: The All Creatures Great and Small Christmas Special required Samuel West to act opposite a horse - and, among the cheese, it was wonderful
articles.content: There is no Bafta category for best acting with a horse but if there were, Samuel West would be a shoo-in. There was more than one occasion in the All Creatures Great and Small Christmas Special (Cha… [+2099 chars]
